mapper.sql: VEHICLE_ID, TSC_ID, VEHICLE_STATE, VEHICLE_TYPE, CURRENT_PORT_ID, REQ_TIME, ASSIGNED_TIME, ACQUIRE_START_TIME, ACQUIRE_CMP_TIME, DEPOSIT_START_TIME, DEPOSIT_CMP_TIME, UNASSIGNED_TIME, TOTAL_OPE, TOTAL_ERR, INSTALLED_TIME, REMOVED_TIME, VEHICLE_KIND, RTM_TSC_ID, CURRENT_BCU
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from VEHICLE
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into VEHICLE (VEHICLE_ID, TSC_ID, VEHICLE_STATE, VEHICLE_TYPE, CURRENT_PORT_ID, REQ_TIME, ASSIGNED_TIME, ACQUIRE_START_TIME, ACQUIRE_CMP_TIME, DEPOSIT_START_TIME, DEPOSIT_CMP_TIME, UNASSIGNED_TIME, TOTAL_OPE, TOTAL_ERR, INSTALLED_TIME, REMOVED_TIME, VEHICLE_KIND, RTM_TSC_ID, CURRENT_BCU) values (#{vehicleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tscId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{vehicleState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehicleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currentPortId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reqTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assignedTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acquireStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acquireCmpTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{depositStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{depositCmpTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unassignedTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalOpe,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalErr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{installedTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{removedTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehicleKind,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rtmTscId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{currentBcu,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into VEHICLE
VEHICLE_ID,
TSC_ID,
VEHICLE_STATE,
VEHICLE_TYPE,
CURRENT_PORT_ID,
REQ_TIME,
ASSIGNED_TIME,
ACQUIRE_START_TIME,
ACQUIRE_CMP_TIME,
DEPOSIT_START_TIME,
DEPOSIT_CMP_TIME,
UNASSIGNED_TIME,
TOTAL_OPE,
TOTAL_ERR,
INSTALLED_TIME,
REMOVED_TIME,
VEHICLE_KIND,
RTM_TSC_ID,
CURRENT_BCU,

mapper.update:
update VEHICLE
VEHICLE_ID = #{record.vehicleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TSC_ID = #{record.tscId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
VEHICLE_STATE = #{record.vehicleState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VEHICLE_TYPE = #{record.vehicleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CURRENT_PORT_ID = #{record.currentPortId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REQ_TIME = #{record.reqTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ASSIGNED_TIME = #{record.assignedTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACQUIRE_START_TIME = #{record.acquireStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACQUIRE_CMP_TIME = #{record.acquireCmpTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPOSIT_START_TIME = #{record.depositStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPOSIT_CMP_TIME = #{record.depositCmpTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNASSIGNED_TIME = #{record.unassignedTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TOTAL_OPE = #{record.totalOpe,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TOTAL_ERR = #{record.totalErr,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
INSTALLED_TIME = #{record.installedTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMOVED_TIME = #{record.removedTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VEHICLE_KIND = #{record.vehicleKind,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RTM_TSC_ID = #{record.rtmTscId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CURRENT_BCU = #{record.currentBcu,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update VEHICLE set VEHICLE_ID = #{record.vehicleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TSC_ID = #{record.tscId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, VEHICLE_STATE = #{record.vehicleState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VEHICLE_TYPE = #{record.vehicleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CURRENT_PORT_ID = #{record.currentPortId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REQ_TIME = #{record.reqTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ASSIGNED_TIME = #{record.assignedTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACQUIRE_START_TIME = #{record.acquireStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACQUIRE_CMP_TIME = #{record.acquireCmpTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPOSIT_START_TIME = #{record.depositStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPOSIT_CMP_TIME = #{record.depositCmpTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNASSIGNED_TIME = #{record.unassignedTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOTAL_OPE = #{record.totalOpe,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TOTAL_ERR = #{record.totalErr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, INSTALLED_TIME = #{record.installedTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMOVED_TIME = #{record.removedTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VEHICLE_KIND = #{record.vehicleKind,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RTM_TSC_ID = #{record.rtmTscId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CURRENT_BCU = #{record.currentBcu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update VEHICLE
TSC_ID = #{tscId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
VEHICLE_STATE = #{vehicleState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VEHICLE_TYPE = #{vehicleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CURRENT_PORT_ID = #{currentPortId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REQ_TIME = #{reqTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ASSIGNED_TIME = #{assignedTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACQUIRE_START_TIME = #{acquireStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACQUIRE_CMP_TIME = #{acquireCmpTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPOSIT_START_TIME = #{depositStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPOSIT_CMP_TIME = #{depositCmpTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNASSIGNED_TIME = #{unassignedTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TOTAL_OPE = #{totalOpe,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TOTAL_ERR = #{totalErr,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
INSTALLED_TIME = #{installedTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMOVED_TIME = #{removedTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VEHICLE_KIND = #{vehicleKind,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RTM_TSC_ID = #{rtmTscId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CURRENT_BCU = #{currentBcu,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where VEHICLE_ID = #{vehicleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update VEHICLE set TSC_ID = #{tscId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, VEHICLE_STATE = #{vehicleState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VEHICLE_TYPE = #{vehicleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CURRENT_PORT_ID = #{currentPortId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REQ_TIME = #{reqTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ASSIGNED_TIME = #{assignedTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACQUIRE_START_TIME = #{acquireStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACQUIRE_CMP_TIME = #{acquireCmpTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPOSIT_START_TIME = #{depositStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPOSIT_CMP_TIME = #{depositCmpTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNASSIGNED_TIME = #{unassignedTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOTAL_OPE = #{totalOpe,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TOTAL_ERR = #{totalErr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, INSTALLED_TIME = #{installedTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMOVED_TIME = #{removedTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VEHICLE_KIND = #{vehicleKind,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RTM_TSC_ID = #{rtmTscId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CURRENT_BCU = #{currentBcu,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where VEHICLE_ID = #{vehicleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

where.if: AND ((vehicle.tsc_id <> -200 AND vehicle.tsc_id = #{currentTscId} ) OR (vehicle.tsc_id = -200 AND vehicle.rtm_tsc_id = #{currentTscId}))

mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM vehicle LEFT OUTER JOIN transfer ON vehicle.vehicle_id = transfer.machine_id AND ((vehicle.tsc_id = -200 AND vehicle.rtm_tsc_id = transfer.tsc_id) OR(vehicle.tsc_id <> -200 AND vehicle.tsc_id = transfer.tsc_id))

SELECT rn, vehicle_id, vehicle_state, tsc_id, current_port_id, carrier_id, command_id, src_loc, dst_loc, total_ope FROM ( SELECT row_number() over(order by vehicle.vehicle_id ) rn, vehicle.vehicle_id, vehicle.vehicle_state, (CASE WHEN vehicle.tsc_id = -200 THEN to_char(vehicle.rtm_tsc_id ) ELSE (SELECT TSC_ABBREVIATION FROM tsc WHERE vehicle.tsc_id = tsc.tsc_id) END) tsc_id, vehicle.current_port_id, transfer.carrier_id, transfer.command_id, transfer.src_loc, transfer.dst_loc, vehicle.total_ope FROM vehicle LEFT OUTER JOIN transfer ON vehicle.vehicle_id = transfer.machine_id AND ((vehicle.tsc_id = -200 AND vehicle.rtm_tsc_id = transfer.tsc_id) OR(vehicle.tsc_id <> -200 AND vehicle.tsc_id = transfer.tsc_id))
ORDER BY vehicle_id )
